title: Fundamentals of Medical Law
headline: This free online course introduces the fundamentals of medical law and legislation across the United Kingdom.
description: This course on the fundamentals of medical law will assist you in understanding the various laws and regulations you must observe. You will appreciate the significance of laws on medical records and treatment. This course examines the roles, legal rights and responsibilities of social workers in healthcare and the essential laws in the United Kingdom. Explore what medical law is and why it is crucial to know it.
courseDescription:
This course on the ‘Fundamentals of Medical Law’ provides extensive knowledge of numerous laws and statutes and teaches you how to apply fundamental principles in this profession. It describes and analyses the characteristics and methods of health and medical reporting legislation. You will learn to conduct legal research on beneficial treatments. Discover the legislation on adult support, public health and health service. We examine the latest classification of Coronavirus legislation.

The course then prepares you by examining mental health and the laws that govern it in the United Kingdom. First, acquire knowledge of abortion and essential abortion-related laws in the UK. We will then explore the significance of mental health and how to safeguard the ethical aspect of medical law. At the end of the course, you will have the answers to the questions such as ‘what is medical law?’ and ‘what are the different mental health laws in the UK?’.

This course will introduce you to medical law and public health basics if you have never studied them before. In order to help you make informed decisions, we provide you with an in-depth knowledge of all applicable rules and regulations. This course is an excellent starting place for those who are just beginning to learn about medical law. So enrol now and master these foundational skills.
